summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1708, for the improvement of Thirty-sixth Avenue, from East Spring Street to East Cherry Street, by constructing sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all wyes, manholes, catch basins and other appurtenances necessary for the proper sewering and draining of said district, under Ordinance No. 18143 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
